Question: Which statements accurately describe the relationships between the nodes in the context of the development of Facebook?

Answer: B) Thefacebook was the original name of Facebook., C) Yale students were included in Facebook after its expansion., D) The Winklevoss twins thought Thefacebook was exclusive to Ivy League students.
